name: Square's Adventure
description:
Mr. Square was taken away to a research facility to be studied. The researchers had collaborated with the government to study the reflexes and abilities of a regular quadrilateral. Square was sedated and found himself in the lab. 

While the researchers are asleep, help Mr. Square escape the scientific dungeons and return home.

This is my first game on itch.io

Enjoy :)

------------------------------------

This is a game by Kshitij Kulkarni(Me)
